pages.title: Deep Crystal Powder
pages.text: This powder is nearly as often used in crafting recipes as $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el are. It can be obtained from the $(l:e_block_deep_crystal_ore)Deep Crystal Ores/el or by $(l:e_block_mana_grinder)crushing/el $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el.
